textEasy: It is very easy to sell the products in your product list in bulk on

stepOne.youMustEnter: You must enter the brand name of the product you want to upload in the brand column of the product entry excel!
stepOne.youNeedToSearch: You need to search if your brand is in the system. If the brand you are looking for is not found in the system, you can define your brand.

stepTwo.youCanUploadText: You can upload products by selecting a category.
stepTwo.enteringInfo: By entering barcode information, price (TSF), strikethrough price (PSF), and stock information can be updated

stepThree.templateMustMatch: The file template you want to upload must match the upload type.
